data.author: SetPebble
data.description:
Smile!  Capture an image on your smart phone and send it to your Pebble.  Flick your wrist or chose your refresh rate to switch between images.  Customizable settings.

This high-def version turns some pixels on and off rapidly to gain the appearance of colored pixels.  The displayed image looks terrific, but the battery drains faster.
data.title: Camoodle HD

data.author: nickopops

changelog.release_notes: Updated for both color and round Pebbles!

data.description: This watch ain't nothin' to fuck wit'.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated for both color and round Pebbles!

data.title: Wu-Watch

data.author: Pete Hepple
data.description:
Clean, minimal, packed with information.

Battery level is indicated by a simple line running down the left-hand side in 10% increments. Almost invisible head-on, yet clear to read when the Pebble is angled with the left side slightly away from you.

Hacked together from Pranav Vishnu's beautiful Clear Pebble and incorporating modified battery level indicator code from Foxel's Simple F.
data.title: CleanLines

data.author: Eric BERGELIN
data.description:
Plain and obvious sector watch, 
time is displayed by a sector between hour and minute hand.
Polar or pie clock, originally way to wear time.
data.title: sector

data.author: BOOMik

changelog.release_notes:
Remove Leading Zero on hour
"Jacket" mode for right hand
(All optional)

New design.
More features & settings
Stabilize.
Improved battery consumption

Support 12/24 hours
Support optional vibrate every hour
Fix long day of week name

data.description:
Simple BOOMik Face.


Features:
"Jacket" mode
Support 12/24 hours
Optional every hour vibrate
Vibrate on connect/disconnect Bluetooth
Minimum battery consumption
2 clock font
2 theme: light & dark
Inverse when battery < 20%
Show number of week instead battery state
Inverse when Bluetooth 

Android companion (change wathface settings) (coming soon..)

latest_release.release_notes:
Remove Leading Zero on hour
"Jacket" mode for right hand
(All optional)

data.title: Simple Bace

data.author: OJW
data.description: Only an hour hand.  But zoomed in so you can see detail

data.author: stackone
data.description: Watchface that shows the time in a stylish way with dots. Uses cool animations when the time changes.

data.author: OJW
data.description: Only an hour hand.  But zoomed in so that you can see the detail.
data.title: Quadrant

data.author: Lonsdaleite
data.description:
This watchface shows the time using vibrations.
Just shake your hand and feel current time!
0 - one LONG vibration
1 - one short vibration
2 - two short vibrations
...
9 - nine short vibrations
data.title: Vibration Time

data.author: mrchnk
data.description:
Russian text watchface. 
Used custom font optimized for pebble.
No need in special firmware.
data.title: polvtorogo

data.author: Luke Mitchell
data.description:
A simple and well designed watchface. Includes Date, Time and Day. The current Day is marked with a minimal underscore.

Font: Futura Bold / Futura Medium

Features:
- Fully configurable from the Pebble app
- Theme (black / white)
- First day of the week (Sun / Mon)
- Hourly Vibration toggle
data.title: Marked 2

data.author: Duendiyo
data.description: Que mas se le puede decir a la persona que amas...

data.author: Charlie Hawker

changelog.release_notes: Fixes app crashes on watches using firmware version 2.1
Fixed random number generator seeding glitch

data.description:
Bingo-scorecard inspired watchface. Numbers not in use randomise each minute, highlighted cells change on the minute and hour as needed.

If you like it, love it (♥) above!

Feel free to get in touch with feedback.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixes app crashes on watches using firmware version 2.1

data.title: Bingo

data.author: Luke Harries

changelog.release_notes: Updates behaviour so that the hour slides along with the minutes when it reaches [][]:59

data.description: A sleek digital watch face, with minutes that scroll elegantly into focus. Configurable to show time in 24 or 12h format, with Light or Dark settings.

latest_release.release_notes: Updates behaviour so that the hour slides along with the minutes when it reaches [][]:59

data.author: JoshuaJ0
data.description: The Beam Up watch face, with a twist! Has date and the slider moves in 5 second intervals instead of 15.
data.title: Beam Up: Date, 5 Seconds

data.author: Jack T.

changelog.release_notes: v2.7: Added option to show battery as digit and to show it only below an specific level

v2.6
- Fixed radio icon on aplite platform
- Changed background to have smaller outer lines (thanks Ha Do Bac)
v2.5: Bad looking Workaround for missing Radio on old Pebble, awaiting Bugfix in the SDK.
v2.4: Added option to hide seconds or update only on specific intervall
v2.2: Fixed crash on special weather circumstances

v2.1: 
Moved seconds to new window to avoid update all on every second, to save battery. 
Fixed dark cloud icon. 
Fixed version display in configuration screen.
v2.0: Added Weather, Battery Charge Animation, Vibration for BT loss, AM/PM Symbols for 12h Clock and  smoother Graphics for Pebble Time. Fixed DD/MM Display for US form.
v1.5: Updated to SDK 2.1.1, need Pebble 2.1 Firmware. Removed Animation as it was just a Test...
v1.4: Add Settings for inverted, hourly vibration and date format

data.description:
A Watchface of my previous Watch, an Casio-WV-58DE. 
With Weather, Bluetooth, Battery and DST Status.
Weather update every hour.
This is the original Watch: 
http://www.casio-europe.com/de/watch/waveceptor/wv-58de-1avef
data.title: Casio-WV-58DE

data.author: Jack T.

changelog.release_notes:
v2.5
-Added show seconds interval to save battery
-Added date mode like on original watch (thanks for suggest to Robert Rosenberg)
-Added AM/PM signs on 12h mode (not in date mode)
v2.2: Optimized draw Hour/Minute Hands, add Inverter on Pebble Time, add charge Animation, add option to disable BT loss vibration
v2.1: Fixed Seconds in inverted Mode
v2.0: Included Color Version for Pebble Time, add Vibration on BT loss, add configuration for showing second digits
v1.1: Add Smart Status for BT, Battery and Settings for inverted, hourly vibration and date format

data.description:
Watchface Clone of an Casio AE-20W, with fully worked Animations, like the original!
This is the Original: http://www.vintagelcd.com/vul/item/642/
data.title: Casio AE-20W

data.author: Stephan Hussong

changelog.release_notes: Oberfläche ist jetzt konfigurierbar, Datum, Kalenderwoche, Bluetooth-Status, Ladezustand und eine digitale Zeitangabe können jetzt ein- und ausgeblendet werden, ebenso Trennlinien zur besseren Lesbarkeit. Zusätzlich kann die Anzeige invers geschaltet werden.

data.description:
German version of the FuzzyTime watch face, completely rewritten.

"Wie spät ist es?" - "Sechzehn Uhr siebenundzwanzig!"
So sagen wohl die wenigsten von uns die Zeit. Warum sie also nicht so anzeigen, wie wir gewohnt sind, sie zu sagen.

Deutsche Version des FuzzyTime Watchface, vollständig neu geschrieben. Ergänzt um das Datum und die Kalenderwoche und eine feiner granulierte Anzeige.

latest_release.release_notes: Oberfläche ist jetzt konfigurierbar, Datum, Kalenderwoche, Bluetooth-Status, Ladezustand und eine digitale Zeitangabe können jetzt ein- und ausgeblendet werden, ebenso Trennlinien zur besseren Lesbarkeit. Zusätzlich kann die Anzeige invers geschaltet werden.

data.title: RoughClock

data.author: Edward Peek

changelog.release_notes: Fixed absolutely nothing. It was the -tests- that had the bug.

data.description:
Is it day? Is it night? Now -you- can find out! By utilising billions of dollars' worth of infrastructure, the Solar watch face now lets you answer this difficult question.

iPhone users: You may need to wait for the next Pebble app update before you are able to add this watch face.

Note: Solar infrequently checks your phone's GPS location in order to calibrate itself.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed absolutely nothing. It was the -tests- that had the bug.

data.title: Solar

data.author: stix

changelog.release_notes:
Use the new direct frame buffer access for faster and more CPU and power efficient drawing.
Rebuild with SDK 2.7.
Major/minor versions and rebuild with SDK 2.4.1.
Don't like your battery? I've added configurable refresh rates, from 1s (1Hz) to 50ms (20Hz). Rough estimation says on 250ms (4Hz) you lose about 40% battery in 24 hours.
Rebuild with 2.0.0 SDK, potentially fixes install issues.

data.description:
Conway's Game of Life, brought to life on Pebble. Uses a bitmap of the time text as a seed for life to evolve.

New with version 1.2.0: Don't like your battery? I've added configurable refresh rates, from 1s (1Hz) to 50ms (20Hz). Rough estimation says on 250ms (4Hz) you lose about 40% battery in 24 hours.
data.title: Conway's

data.author: mikean23
data.description: Based off the Simplicity Watchface from pebble. Time and date in Battlestar Galactica font. Bluetooth indicator and battery percentage displayed on the bottom.
data.title: Simplicity++ Battlestar Galactica Edition

data.author: rm.dev
data.description:
Snoozing and don't want to open your eyes? Or it's dark and you don't fancy being blasted in the retina by white light?

Just drowsily mash one of the watchface cycle buttons until you get to Nightbuzz. It'll tell you the time by vibrating so you can save your precious eyes!

Full instructions on the website (damn that 400 character restriction!)
data.title: Nightbuzz: anti-watchface

data.author: Marcus Gotling

changelog.release_notes: Make configurable so inverse watchface can be removed

data.description:
Displays the time as an eye using lines to form parabolic curves and a circle.

Time of screenshots
1: 04:30:30
2: 14:15:42
3: 20:45:16

Setting for inverse colors.

Updates every second so most likely uses a lot of battery. Optimisations possible.

latest_release.release_notes: Make configurable so inverse watchface can be removed

data.description:
This classic watch-face features an easy to read display with all your time and date information at a glance.

- Vibrate every hour (optional in settings)
- Year, Month, Date, Day, Hour, Minute, Second
- Bluetooth connection indicator with vibrate on disconnect (optional in settings)
-Battery Level and "Plugged in" indicator
-12/24 hour support
-Supports MM-DD and DD-MM date formats

data.author: chops
data.description:
Skyline for Melbourne, Australia. All credit to dexif (Day/Night) for the code, i just changed the background images and modified the date and BT representation!

I've decided to give this a refresh.  The time font 'appears' to be sitting behind the city skyline.

When BT is off/lost during the day the sun is partially obscured by a cloud.

When BT is off/lost at night the stars disappear.

data.author: lesliesbird

changelog.release_notes:
3.6 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.
The ball drop shadow is now dithered, allowing the background grid to show through.
3.5 - Added support for Pebble Time Round
3.4 - Now compatible with Pebble Aplite running firmware 3.8
3.3 - Now tested on Pebble Time - compliant.
3.2 Changes to appinfo.json that support the loading of different resources for aplite or basalt
3.1 - Color support for Pebble Time/Time Steel!
version 3.0 - Updated to SDK 3.0, ball graphics cleaned up a bit.
2.1.0 - added accelerometer tap sensitivity to change bounce pattern.

data.description:
Recreates the original Boing Ball demo from the Amiga computer. The ball rotates and bounces around the screen, while the time readout is using the original Amiga Topaz font. Shake or tap the watch along the Y (negative) axis to change the pattern of the bounce. Best way is to hold the watch the way you look at it, then bring your arm abruptly towards your body.

Constantly animated watchfaces can put a heavy drain on the battery but it is fun to show off.

Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723

latest_release.release_notes:
3.6 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.
The ball drop shadow is now dithered, allowing the background grid to show through.

data.title: Amiga Boing

data.author: Moises Aranas
data.description: Q-Watch Digital is based on the famous Q-Watch v2.01 Beta, but instead of an analog clock, it has the current time and date. The left bars indicate the battery status, and the right bars indicate the bluetooth connectivity status with the Pebble phone app.

data.author: David Lancaster
data.description:
Hello investors. At Aperture Laboratories, the boys down in the lab never see the big picture. Yesterday, they came up to me and said "Cave, the new P.E.B.B.L.E. communications device is great for indicating testing progress and warning about potential hazards, but it's prone to exploding!". So, I said "Great! But what else can it do?"

Cave Johnson, we're done here.
data.title: PortalFace

data.author: Luigi Picaro

changelog.release_notes: Lastest FIX solved bad behavior with Official Appstore watchface settings.

data.description:
My watchface is inspired by Revolution implemented by Douwe Maan. It has an header bar for connection status and battery remaining hours. Sort prefix is because the size of the elements is ordered in such a way inversely proportional to their duration.

For more informations visit MyPebbleFaces website link below.

latest_release.release_notes: Lastest FIX solved bad behavior with Official Appstore watchface settings.

data.author: Joe Gottschall

changelog.release_notes: Based on example code Just-a-bit and Simplicity

data.description:
The Bikron watchface is modeled after a clock made in the late 1970's by John Wells of Media House Corporation, Columbus, Ohio.The clock is a Binary Coded Decimal (BCD) display which is read vertically, with the Least Significant Digit (LSD) at the top. There are five columns: hours, tens of minutes, minutes, tens of seconds and seconds.
The hours column uses all four bits to count from 1 to 12.

latest_release.release_notes: Based on example code Just-a-bit and Simplicity

data.title: Bikron BCD Watchface

data.author: Pranav Vishnu
data.description: A simple, clean watch face using Helvetica Neue. Displays Time, Date and Day. Supports both 24 and 12-hour Modes. Made to go easy on your battery, as time only updates once a minute.

data.author: saulricardo
data.description:
Display Time and Date
Idle state shows Dark Link against Triforce
Shake it and shows Link agains Dark Triforce
data.title: LinkDarkLink

data.author: Eric
data.description:
This watch face uses geometric objects to tell the time.

The first row is 3 hr increments, the left box in the second row adds 1 hr, the right adds 2 hrs.

Then row of triangles are 10 minute increments.

The bottom square is the final digit of minute represented using binary.  The left triangle is 1 minute, the top 2, the bottom 4, and the right 8. 

Adding all areas gives you the time.
data.title: Geometric

data.author: Chris Regado

data.author: Niknam Moslehi

changelog.release_notes: Fixes the bug of the time not being centered while in 12-hour mode (thanks to Julian Lepinski). Also included more characters to the date font.

data.description:
Shows you the current weather conditions at a glance. Also keeps the weather information updated every 15 minutes, indicates if the weather information is stale, and gives you a heads-up if your Pebble loses its connection to your phone.

Based on the work by Katharine Berry (WeatherWatch) and Martin Rosinski (Roboto Weather).
data.title: Futura Weather

data.author: Huy Duc Le
data.description:
VN Clock is a beautiful watchface that shows the current  date/time, battery, connection and Lunar info. It's only supports Vietnamese

Các chức năng:
- Hiển thị chi tiết thông tin Âm Lịch với ngày giờ hiện tại.
- Hiển thị ngày tháng Dương Lịch
- Hiển thị trạng thái Pin với 5 loại: Yếu, T. Bình, Cao, Sạc đầy và Đang sạc.
- Báo rung khi cắm sạc
- Báo rung khi kết nối/ngắt kết nối Bluetooth
data.title: VN Clock

data.author: Orologics

changelog.release_notes: 1.0.3 Fixes midnight without breaking the other times.

data.description: An inverted background version of the words watchface with larger letters and the date.
data.title: Words & Date

data.description: Simple binary clock without seconds to reduce battery use. With date.

data.author: Keelan C

changelog.release_notes: You can now configure for Fahrenheit or Celsius from the Pebble mobile app.

data.description:
A 'better' version of the default 'Text Watch' watchface by Pebble Tech.
 Tap/shake the watch for date and weather info. Choose °C or °F from the mobile app.
 Added ‘o’ prefix for single-digit minutes, so “two eight” appears as “two o’ eight”.

latest_release.release_notes: You can now configure for Fahrenheit or Celsius from the Pebble mobile app.

data.title: Text Watch 2

data.author: Roberto Hortal

changelog.release_notes: Initial release. Port of my original Zingy Animated watchface for firmware 1.0. Now compatible with firmware 2.0.

data.description: Animated watchface featuring Zingy dancing on your screen

latest_release.release_notes: Initial release. Port of my original Zingy Animated watchface for firmware 1.0. Now compatible with firmware 2.0.

data.title: Zingy Animated

data.author: Number3

changelog.release_notes:
fixed a bug that made it flash to noon for a split-second when switching to this watchface.
Also made the hand a bit thicker so it's easier to read.

data.description:
"When you zoom close enough, you don't need a minute hand anymore."

An analog watch, zoomed very close to the hour hand. So close, in fact, that you can read the time down to the exact minute once you're used to it.

latest_release.release_notes:
fixed a bug that made it flash to noon for a split-second when switching to this watchface.
Also made the hand a bit thicker so it's easier to read.

data.title: Zoomed

data.author: George Streten
data.description:
Buzz speeds up time. Simple.

Based upon Purr (by James Brooks) and the Original Text Watch watchface by Pebble, Buzz vibrates your pebble every five minutes, changing your perception of time. 

The time alteration idea was discovered by Skrekkøgle, who made Durr, a watch-shaped object that did exactly the same as what your Pebble can now do. Magic.
data.title: Buzz

data.author: 8a22a
data.description:
A beautiful analogue watchface including day, date and battery percentage. 
Based on artwork by c0u94r.
(Inverted version)
data.title: Art Deco Inverted

data.author: Nathan Fearnley
data.description:
Pebble TF2 Spy Watchface

Loses invisibility energy as you move, regains it if you sit still

This watchface does not show the time


Thank you very much to Scott Beaudry (Scottbee) who provided me with the art assets!
data.title: SpyWatch

data.description: A version of this wathcface with the leading Zero

data.author: Matt

data.description: Inverted version of the AlfaSlab wathface, based on the "Arcade Time" watchface, from Ice2097

data.author: Nathan Fearnley
data.description:
Pony-themed Pebble Watchface with custom watch hands

The foreground hoof with the wrist watch is the hour hand
The background hoof is the minute hand

Thank you very much to Scott Beaudry (Scottbee) who provided me with the art assets!
data.title: Hooves

data.author: jmad1
data.description:
Watchface for Snoopy fans!  Display your Joe Cool watch for all to see.

Watch face can be either 12 hour or 24 hour format with day of the week and date.

Author: Joe Madrigal
data.title: Joe Cool Time

data.author: FawzmaGames
data.description:
This is a remake of "In and Out" by special request to have the hour ticket on the outer ring, with minutes in the middle.

Current date is in FDA format for those in certain industries that could use the format reminder.

There is a low batter indicator that will display in the upper left coner when the charge is less than 20 percent.

Don't for get the love <3
data.title: Out and In

data.author: Bob Hauck
data.description: Minor modification of the standard Simplicity face to add the day of the week.
data.title: SimplDay

data.author: rigel314
data.description: A Pebble watchface inspired by the map in the amazing game, Antichamber.
data.title: Antichamber

data.author: rigel314

changelog.release_notes: Simple black sine wave on white background.

data.description:
To read:
The number of nodes is the number of hours.  At one o'clock, there is only half a cycle showing.

The number of minutes is shown by looking at the top end of the wave. The antinodes are 30 minutes. Zero minutes is at the most recent node. 60 minutes is at the next node that isn't shown yet.

Example:
The first picture is showing about 4:20.

latest_release.release_notes: Simple black sine wave on white background.

data.title: Sine Wave

data.author: rafasinger
data.description: A variation of the Ice2097's Arcade Time wathface, with a beautiful squared font.

data.description: A version of the Big Time watchface, with date at the bottom and using the beautiful ALfa Slab One font from JM Solé.
data.title: AlfaSlab

data.author: James Brooks

changelog.release_notes: Uses a custom vibration pattern to help differentiate between Purr and alerts.

data.description:
Return to your senses…

Purr is the watch face that pulls you back into the now. Purr doesn't display the time, it just vibrates every five minutes to remind you of where you are.

latest_release.release_notes: Uses a custom vibration pattern to help differentiate between Purr and alerts.

data.title: Purr
